sentences.en: A lux is a measure of the illumination given by a light to a distant surface.
sentences.cn: 勒克斯是光对于遥远表面的照明度的量度单位.

sentences.en: After illumination , the prolamellar body is converted into sheets.
sentences.cn: 照光以后,这些原气层体转变为片层.

sentences.en: Daylight came in through its glass roof; this was now the only illumination.
sentences.cn: 日光透过玻璃屋顶照入; 眼下这是室内惟一的照明.

sentences.en: Direct illumination is harsh and unflattering.
sentences.cn: 直射光照明既刺目又呆板。

sentences.en: He sought illumination from the works of the great philosophers.
sentences.cn: 他从伟大哲人的著作中寻求启迪.

sentences.en: He uses statistics as a drunken man use lamp - post for support rather than for illumination.
sentences.cn: 他要利用统计数字,正如醉汉之利用电灯柱 - -非为借光,实为撑腰.

sentences.en: I found great illumination in his remark.
sentences.cn: 我从他的话中得到很大的启发.

sentences.en: No further illumination can be had from this theory.
sentences.cn: 这一理论不能给人以更深刻的启迪。

sentences.en: Now she was the centre of a little illumination of her own.
sentences.cn: 现在她正处于愉快的心情之中.

sentences.en: The four stages of creative thought are preparation, incubation, illumination, and verification.
sentences.cn: 创造性思考的四个阶段是准备 、 沉思 、 启迪 、 求证.

sentences.en: The library's reading - rooms need better illumination.
sentences.cn: 图书馆里阅览室的灯光不够明亮,需要改进.

sentences.en: The only illumination came from a small window high in the opposite wall.
sentences.cn: 唯一的亮光来自对面墙上高处的一扇小窗子。

sentences.en: The only illumination in the room came from the fire.
sentences.cn: 屋子里唯一的光亮来自炉火。

sentences.en: The plants need a fertile soil and bright illumination.
sentences.cn: 培植需要肥沃土壤和明亮光照.

sentences.en: The skylight will provide good illumination from above.
sentences.cn: 顶上有天窗,光线会很充足.

sentences.en: White candles, the only illumination, burned on the table.
sentences.cn: 白蜡烛作为唯一的照明在桌子上燃烧着。

words.tran_cn: [电]照明；[光]照度；启发；灯饰（需用复数）；阐明

phrases.tran_cn: 照明度；照明水平；照度级

trans.tran_cn: 照明，阐明，解释清楚，<物>照度，彩饰，图案花饰
trans.tran_en: lighting provided by a lamp, light etc
